Missile Turret MK4
Missile Turret MK4 Center
OUTDATED OUTDATED OUTDATED OUTDATED OUTDATED OUTDATED OUTDATED OUTDATED
Fires single-use missiles at larger targets. Missiles should be stored in an adjacent Storage Hopper.
